title: App Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Mobile-Based Programming Fundamentals Course for Professionals in Their 40s

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Cultivate the ability to design simple algorithms for solving everyday problems
Implementation of Python-based programming syntax with over 80% accuracy in mobile environments

In 2-week team projects, learners provide ≥5 peer feedback instances via GitHub Pull Requests on three teammates’ code, incorporate ≥3 peer feedbacks, and improve code quality scores (≥7/10 rubric) through a debugging process

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
